title: Spotlight video request: Runes Reforged
body: Why? Because I'm on the atypical spectrum and I like how the videos explain things.

replies.body: isnt there like a video for each path?

There is a lot of information so I doubt they could do a short video, here is Phreak 'briefly' explaining them over the course of half an hour.

https://youtu.be/k2NcPH_xTiU?t=33m10s
